xml.brief: Retrieve information on a multiple cachesets

desc.p: Retrieve information on a multiple cache sets in one request.
Please see the cacheset method for more information about what cache sets are.

req.name: cacheset_uuids
req.p: Pipe-separated list of cacheset UUIDs. These represent the cachesets you are interested in. No more than 500 UUIDs are allowed. Unlike in the "cacheset" method, this CAN be an empty string (it will result in an empty, but valid, response).

opt.name: langpref
opt.p: Same as in the services/cachesets/cacheset method. Pipe-separated list of ISO 639-1 language codes (preferred languages for fields like name and description).

opt.name: fields
opt.p: Same as in the services/cachesets/cacheset method. Pipe-separated list of field names which you are interested with.

returns.p: A dictionary. Cacheset UUIDs you provide will be mapped to dictionary keys, and each value will be a dictionary of fields you have selected.
Value of null means that no cacheset by this UUID has been found. (This behavior is different than in the services/cachesets/cacheset method, which responds with a HTTP 400 error in such case.)
